Package de.server.service.userAndSelfServiceStand

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
de.server.service.userAndSelfServiceStand.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Service class contains methods that are used to manage the user.
